official_title: Comparison of 3 Modes of Genetic Counseling in High-Risk Public Hospital
inclusion_criteria:
Eligible participants include patients who

* visit the mammography, high risk or oncology clinics at Contra Costa County, Highland or SFGH hospitals,
* are referred to genetic counseling services at SFGH by a community clinic through the E-Referral system or are considered to be high risk based on their breast/ovarian cancer genetics Referral Screening Tool (RST) score (â‰¥ 2 checks)
* speak English, Spanish, or Cantonese

Investigators will also include two genetic counselors who provide services at SFGH and UCSF.
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
Must have maximum age of 70 Years
